attributes.additional_details: I am petitioning for the NHS doctors/GP's to refer all EDS and PoTS patients to a relevant specialist and not just leave them to suffer just because they are classed as invisible diseases. Most GP's are not referring patients because they do not understand the rare conditions and therefore leave us to suffer in silence. There are too many of us and enough is enough. The NHS looks into every other medical condition, why not ours?
